languages.text: Тип атаки {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}дальнего боя{/g}, направленный в одну цель. Такой выстрел не может поразить противников, стоящих между стрелком и его целью, но в случае промаха, успешного {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонения{/g} цели или успешного сквозного пробития способен нанести {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} персонажам позади основной цели (как противникам, так и союзникам). Когда персонаж атакует одиночным выстрелом, он совершает бросок на {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} по одной цели с базовым шансом успеха, равным (30 + Дальний Бой атакующего)%. После броска к результату прибавляются все {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g}, увеличивающие шанс попадания. Этот шанс уменьшается вдвое, если враг находится дальше эффективной {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дальности{/g} стрельбы оружия (обычно она равна половине максимальной дальности).
languages.original_text: A type of ranged attack aimed at a single target. Such shot cannot hit opponents standing between the shooter and his target, but in case of a miss, successful {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} or successful overpenetration, he can {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} characters behind the main target (both opponents and allies). When a character attacks with a Single Shot, they roll to hit one target with a base success chance of 30+(Arrow Ranged)%. After the roll, any bonuses that increase the chance to hit are added to the result. This chance is halved if the enemy is further than the effective range of the weapon (usually half the maximum range).

traits.locale_text: Тип атаки дальнего боя, направленный в одну цель. Такой выстрел не может поразить противников, стоящих между стрелком и его целью, но в случае промаха, успешного {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонения{/g} цели или успешного сквозного пробития способен нанести {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}урон{/g} персонажам позади основной цели (как противникам, так и союзникам). Когда персонаж атакует одиночным выстрелом, он совершает бросок на попадание по одной цели с базовым шансом успеха, равным (30 + Дальний Бой стрелка)%. После броска к результату прибавляются все бонусы, увеличивающие шанс попадания. Этот шанс уменьшается вдвое, если враг находится дальше эффективной дальности стрельбы оружия (обычно она равна половине максимальной дальности).

Тип атаки дальнего боя, направленный в одну цель. Такой выстрел не может поразить противников, стоящих между стрелком и его целью, но в случае промаха, успешного {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонения{/g} цели или успешного сквозного пробития способен нанести {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}урон{/g} персонажам позади основной цели (как противникам, так и союзникам). Когда персонаж атакует одиночным выстрелом, он совершает бросок на попадание по одной цели с базовым шансом успеха, равным (30 + Дальний Бой стрелка)%. После броска к результату прибавляются все бонусы, увеличивающие шанс попадания. Этот шанс уменьшается вдвое, если враг находится дальше эффективной дальности стрельбы оружия (обычно она равна половине максимальной дальности).

languages.text: A type of {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack aimed at a single target. Such shots cannot {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} opponents standing between the shooter and their target, but in the case of a miss, successful {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or successful {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}, they can {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} characters behind the main target (both enemies and allies). When a character attacks with a single shot, they roll to hit one target with a base success chance of (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g})%. After the roll, any {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} that increase hit chance are added to the result. This chance is halved if the enemy is farther than the effective range of the weapon (usually half the maximum range).
languages.original_text: Тип атаки {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}дальнего боя{/g}, направленный в одну цель. Такой выстрел не может поразить противников, стоящих между стрелком и его целью, но в случае промаха, успешного {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонения{/g} цели или успешного сквозного пробития способен нанести {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} персонажам позади основной цели (как противникам, так и союзникам). Когда персонаж атакует одиночным выстрелом, он совершает бросок на {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} по одной цели с базовым шансом успеха, равным (30 + Дальний Бой атакующего)%. После броска к результату прибавляются все {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g}, увеличивающие шанс попадания. Этот шанс уменьшается вдвое, если враг находится дальше эффективной {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дальности{/g} стрельбы оружия (обычно она равна половине максимальной дальности).

traits.locale_text: A type of ranged attack aimed at a single target. Such shots cannot hit opponents standing between the shooter and his target, but in the case of a miss, successful {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g}, or successful overpenetration, they can {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} characters behind the main target (both enemies and allies). When a character attacks with a single shot, they roll to hit one target with a base success chance of (30 + Ballistic Skill)%. After the roll, any bonuses that increase hit chance are added to the result. This chance is halved if the enemy is further than the effective range of the weapon (usually half the maximum range).

A type of {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack aimed at a single target. Such shots cannot {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} opponents standing between the shooter and their target, but in the case of a miss, successful {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or successful {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}, they can {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} characters behind the main target (both enemies and allies). When a character attacks with a single shot, they roll to hit one target with a base success chance of (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g})%. After the roll, any {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} that increase hit chance are added to the result. This chance is halved if the enemy is farther than the effective range of the weapon (usually half the maximum range).

A type of {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack aimed at a single target. Such shots cannot {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} opponents standing between the shooter and their target, but in the case of a miss, successful {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or successful {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}, they can {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} characters behind the main target (both enemies and allies). When a character attacks with a single shot, they roll to hit one target with a base success chance of (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g})%. After the roll, any {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} that increase hit chance are added to the result. This chance is halved if the enemy is farther than the effective range of the weapon (usually half the maximum range).

languages.text: Ein Typ von {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfangriff{/g}, der auf ein Einzelziel abzielt. Solche Schüsse können keine Gegner {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}treffen{/g}, die zwischen dem Schützen und seinem Ziel stehen, aber im Falle eines Fehlschusses, eines erfolgreichen {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichens{/g} oder einer gelungenen {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}Überdurchdringung{/g} können sie Charaktere hinter dem Hauptziel {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}beschädigen{/g} (Feinde und Verbündete). Wenn ein Charakter mit einem Einzelschuss angreift, wird gewürfelt, um ein Ziel mit einer Grunderfolgschance (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g}) % zu treffen. Dem Würfel werden etwaige {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} hinzugefügt, die die Trefferchance erhöhen. Diese Chance halbiert sich, wenn der Feind weiter als die wirksame Reichweite der Waffe entfernt ist (üblicherweise die Hälfte der maximalen Reichweite).
languages.original_text: A type of {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack aimed at a single target. Such shots cannot {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} opponents standing between the shooter and their target, but in the case of a miss, successful {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or successful {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}, they can {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} characters behind the main target (both enemies and allies). When a character attacks with a single shot, they roll to hit one target with a base success chance of (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g})%. After the roll, any {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} that increase hit chance are added to the result. This chance is halved if the enemy is farther than the effective range of the weapon (usually half the maximum range).

traits.locale_text: Ein Typ von {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfangriff{/g}, der auf ein Einzelziel abzielt. Solche Schüsse können keine Gegner {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}treffen{/g}, die zwischen dem Schützen und seinem Ziel stehen, aber im Falle eines Fehlschusses, eines erfolgreichen {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichens{/g} oder einer gelungenen {g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}Überdurchdringung{/g} können sie Charaktere hinter dem Hauptziel {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}beschädigen{/g} (Feinde und Verbündete). Wenn ein Charakter mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Einzelschuss{/g} angreift, wird gewürfelt, um ein Ziel mit einer Grunderfolgschance (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g}) % zu treffen. Dem Würfel werden etwaige {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} hinzugefügt, die die {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchance{/g} erhöhen. Diese Chance halbiert sich, wenn der Feind weiter als die wirksame Reichweite der Waffe entfernt ist (üblicherweise die Hälfte der maximalen Reichweite).

languages.text: Type d'attaque à {g|Encyclopedia:Range}distance{/g} visant une seule cible. Ces tirs ne peuvent pas {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}toucher{/g} les adversaires situés entre le tireur et sa cible, mais en cas de tir raté, d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} ou de {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}surpénétration{/g} réussies, ils peuvent {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}infliger des dégâts{/g} aux personnages qui se trouvent derrière la cible principale (ennemis et alliés). Lorsqu'un personnage exécute un tir unique, il effectue un jet de dé pour atteindre une cible avec des chances de réussite de base de (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g}) %. Après le jet de dé, les éventuels {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} qui augmentent les chances de toucher sont ajoutés au résultat. Ces chances sont réduites de moitié si l'ennemi se trouve à une distance supérieure à la portée efficace de l'arme (généralement la moitié de la portée maximale).
languages.original_text: A type of {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack aimed at a single target. Such shots cannot {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} opponents standing between the shooter and their target, but in the case of a miss, successful {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or successful {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}, they can {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} characters behind the main target (both enemies and allies). When a character attacks with a single shot, they roll to hit one target with a base success chance of (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g})%. After the roll, any {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} that increase hit chance are added to the result. This chance is halved if the enemy is farther than the effective range of the weapon (usually half the maximum range).

traits.locale_text: Type d'attaque à {g|Encyclopedia:Range}distance{/g} visant une seule cible. Ces tirs ne peuvent pas {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}toucher{/g} les adversaires situés entre le tireur et sa cible, mais en cas de tir raté, d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} ou de {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}surpénétration{/g} réussies, ils peuvent {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}infliger des dégâts{/g} aux personnages qui se trouvent derrière la cible principale (ennemis et alliés). Lorsqu'un personnage exécute un tir unique, il effectue un jet de dé pour atteindre une cible avec des chances de réussite de base de (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g}) %. Après le jet de dé, les éventuels {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} qui augmentent les chances de toucher sont ajoutés au résultat. Ces chances sont réduites de moitié si l'ennemi se trouve à une distance supérieure à la portée efficace de l'arme (généralement la moitié de la portée maximale).

languages.text: 针对单体目标的{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}攻击。单发射击不会击中射手与目标之间的其他目标。不过，如果单发射击未能{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}，或被目标成功{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}，或是触发{g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}过度穿透{/g}，这种情况下会对主要目标身后的角色造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}（不分敌我）。 当角色进行单发射击时，需要进行掷骰检定，基本成功率为（30+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}）%。掷骰后，所有提高{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}命中率的效果都会加到最终结果中。如果敌人所在的位置超出了武器的有效射程（通常是最大射程的一半），则命中率减半。
languages.original_text: A type of {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack aimed at a single target. Such shots cannot {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} opponents standing between the shooter and their target, but in the case of a miss, successful {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or successful {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}, they can {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} characters behind the main target (both enemies and allies). When a character attacks with a single shot, they roll to hit one target with a base success chance of (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g})%. After the roll, any {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} that increase hit chance are added to the result. This chance is halved if the enemy is farther than the effective range of the weapon (usually half the maximum range).

traits.locale_text: 针对单体目标的远程攻击。单发射击不会击中射手与目标之间的其他目标。不过，如果单发射击未能命中，或被目标成功{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}，或是触发过度穿透，这种情况下会对主要目标身后的角色造成{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}（不分敌我）。 当角色进行单发射击时，需要进行掷骰检定，基本成功率为（30+弹道技能）%。掷骰后，所有提高命中率的效果都会加到最终结果中。如果敌人所在的位置超出了武器的有效射程（通常是最大射程的一半），则命中率减半。

languages.text: Un tipo de ataque {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g} contra un solo objetivo. Estos disparos no pueden {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactar{/g} a oponentes que se encuentren entre el atacante y el objetivo, pero, en caso de fallo, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}sobrepenetración{/g}, pueden {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dañar{/g} a los personajes que se encuentren detrás del objetivo principal (ya sean aliados o enemigos). Cuando un personaje ataca con un solo disparo, hace una tirada para golpear a un objetivo con una probabilidad de impacto base del (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}) %. Tras la tirada, se añaden todas las {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} a la probabilidad de impacto. Esta probabilidad se reduce a la mitad si el enemigo no se encuentra en el alcance efectivo del arma (que normalmente es la mitad de su alcance máximo).
languages.original_text: A type of {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack aimed at a single target. Such shots cannot {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} opponents standing between the shooter and their target, but in the case of a miss, successful {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or successful {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}, they can {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} characters behind the main target (both enemies and allies). When a character attacks with a single shot, they roll to hit one target with a base success chance of (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g})%. After the roll, any {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} that increase hit chance are added to the result. This chance is halved if the enemy is farther than the effective range of the weapon (usually half the maximum range).

traits.locale_text: Un tipo de ataque a distancia contra un solo objetivo. Estos disparos no pueden impactar a oponentes que se encuentren entre el atacante y el objetivo, pero, en caso de fallo, {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} o sobrepenetración, pueden {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}dañar{/g} a los personajes que se encuentren detrás del objetivo principal (ya sean aliados o enemigos). Cuando un personaje ataca con un solo disparo, hace una tirada para golpear a un objetivo con una probabilidad de impacto base del (30 + Habilidad de proyectiles) %. Tras la tirada, se añaden todas las bonificaciones a la probabilidad de impacto. Esta probabilidad se reduce a la mitad si el enemigo no se encuentra en el alcance efectivo del arma (que normalmente es la mitad de su alcance máximo).

languages.original_text: A type of ranged attack aimed at a single target. Such shots cannot hit opponents standing between the shooter and his target, but in the case of a miss, successful {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g}, or successful overpenetration, they can {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} characters behind the main target (both enemies and allies). When a character attacks with a single shot, they roll to hit one target with a base success chance of (30 + Ballistic Skill)%. After the roll, any bonuses that increase hit chance are added to the result. This chance is halved if the enemy is further than the effective range of the weapon (usually half the maximum range).

languages.text: 単一のターゲットに向けられる{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠距離{/g}攻撃のタイプ。こうしたショットは射撃手とその標的の間にいる敵を{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃{/g}することはできないが、ショットを外したり、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}が成功したり{g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}過貫通{/g}に成功した場合はメインターゲットより後方のキャラクター（敵も味方も両方）に{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えることができる。 キャラクターが単発射撃で攻撃した場合、(30+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g})％の基本成功確率で敵1体に対してヒットロールできる。ロールの後、命中率を上昇させる全ての{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}がリザルトに追加される。敵が武器の有効射程（通常、最大射程の半分）よりも遠くにいる場合、この確率は半分になる。
languages.original_text: A type of {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack aimed at a single target. Such shots cannot {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} opponents standing between the shooter and their target, but in the case of a miss, successful {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or successful {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}, they can {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} characters behind the main target (both enemies and allies). When a character attacks with a single shot, they roll to hit one target with a base success chance of (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g})%. After the roll, any {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} that increase hit chance are added to the result. This chance is halved if the enemy is farther than the effective range of the weapon (usually half the maximum range).

traits.locale_text: 単一のターゲットに向けられる遠距離攻撃のタイプ。こうしたショットは射撃手とその標的の間にいる敵を攻撃することはできないが、ショットを外したり、{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}が成功したり過貫通に成功した場合はメインターゲットより後方のキャラクター（敵も味方も両方）に{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}ダメージ{/g}を与えることができる。 キャラクターが単発射撃で攻撃した場合、(30+弾道スキル)％の基本成功確率で敵1体に対してヒットロールできる。ロールの後、命中率を上昇させる全てのボーナスがリザルトに追加される。敵が武器の有効射程（通常、最大射程の半分）よりも遠くにいる場合、この確率は半分になる。

languages.text: Tek bir hedefe yönelik gerçekleştirilen {g|Encyclopedia:Range}menzilli{/g} bir saldırı türü. Bu tarz saldırılar, atışı yapanla hedefi arasında duran düşmanları {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuramaz{/g} ancak ıskalama, başarılı {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} ya da başarılı {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}delip geçme{/g} durumlarında ana hedefin arkasındaki karakterlere (hem düşman hem de dost birim) {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verebilirler. Bir karakter tek atış ile saldırdığında, hedefi vurmak için zar atar. Saldırı, %(30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g}) oranında taban başarı olasılığına sahiptir. Vuruş olasılığını artıran her türlü {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}, zar atıldıktan sonra sonuca eklenir. Düşman, silahın etkili menzilinden (genellikle maksimum menzilin yarısı) daha uzaktaysa bu olasılık yarı yarıya düşer.
languages.original_text: A type of {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack aimed at a single target. Such shots cannot {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} opponents standing between the shooter and their target, but in the case of a miss, successful {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, or successful {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}, they can {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} characters behind the main target (both enemies and allies). When a character attacks with a single shot, they roll to hit one target with a base success chance of (30 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g})%. After the roll, any {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} that increase hit chance are added to the result. This chance is halved if the enemy is farther than the effective range of the weapon (usually half the maximum range).
